short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dicty is an offline dictionary that looks up words in separately available data modules that are shipped as extensions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dicty supports quick lookup in multiple dictionaries, which are supplied as separate chrome extensions. Users can see the most relevant matches immediately as they type, and various typographical / color coding schemes help making the results easier to read.
